name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kout - play games to win your shopping

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Kout for Chrome and play games to win your shopping basket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kout - short for checkout - is a Chrome extension that gives you a chance to win any Amazon.co.uk products for free, or at a discount. It is the extension of the famous website www.kout.io, hosting millions of products.

Watch our video to see how it works!

TUTORIAL
1. Install the extension
2. Browse Amazon.co.uk as usual
3. Under the Add to Cart button, you'll notice a Kout button - clicking this will take you to a free game for a chance to win this products for free!

HOW TO PLAY
The games are completely free and similar to a scratch card. Just use your daily free credits to click on the squares of the grid and see if you're lucky to win. When you run out of credits, you can wait until the next day, or buy extra, but you'll never be forced to. Kout is a free game and always will be!

WHAT ARE MY CHANCES?
The odds are dynamic and change for each product based on their price, supply and demand. 
Overall, you have 1/400 chances to win the product for free and 1/5 chances to win a discount (could be from 5% to 10% off). 

WHAT CAN I WIN?
Every. Single. Product. on Amazon.co.uk. We're adding more retailers soon. Stay tuned!

HOW CAN YOU OFFER PRODUCTS?
We rely on people buying the discounts to offer free products. Our margin comes from re-distributing our affiliate commission to you!

WHAT HAPPENS WHEN I WIN?
We order the product on Amazon and ship it directly to you. It's that simple!

GET IN TOUCH
Find us on Facebook messenger (facebook.com/koutplay) or email support@kout.io if any queries.
